markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 15"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Godsbreath Bow](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1481)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Monsters of Myth](/Sources.aspx?ID=107) pg. 89</row>

**Price** 6,500 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Composite Shortbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=75)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This _+2 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [composite shortbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=75)_ is made from wood, horn, and sinew. Once wielded by Ninshaburian heretics, it's carried in a leather case etched with images of Namzaruum in combat with [Somnalu](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1737). On a successful Strike, it deals an additional 1d6 bludgeoning damage.

<document level="2" id="action-1119" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Godsbreath Bow
